title: Alonso: Verstappen not a threat to my Aston Martin F1 seat
summary: Fernando Alonso says it's "very unlikely" Max Verstappen will be his team-mate, and rejected the idea that he could be replaced by the Dutchman

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Fernando Alonso drive for in Formula 1?
Who is the current reigning World Champion in Formula 1 as of 2023?
What is the primary role of a Formula 1 driver in a team?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Compete in races and contribute to team performance
